documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Provides the name of a specific storage pool. The pool ID can be obtained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem <storage system id> -pool command. 2. Lists volumes on the storage pool specified. The pool ID can be obtained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem <storage system id> pool command. 3. Lists storage extents on the storage pool specified. The pool ID can be obtained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem <storage systemid> -pool command. 4. Lists storage settings for the pool specified. 5. Provides a detailed description of the pool specified. The pool ID can be obtained sing several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem <storagesystem id> -pool command. 6. Provides a detailed list of storage settings for this pool. 7. Provides a detailed description of storage extents on the pool specified. The pool ID an be obtained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem storage system id> -pool command. 8. Provides a detailed description of volumes on the pool specified. The pool ID can be btained using several methods, such as the appiqlist -device -storagesystem<storage system id> -pool command.
